segments.text: I don't know . Where did you leave it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just put it on the chair a while ago , but now it's gone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , I am sure . I bet someone stole it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you should have kept an eye on it .
segments.speaker: S2
